content.raw: I think it would be good to make it clear for each point whether that is in during simulation or in the model editor. On item 3 you explicitly mention the editor, but on item 2 for example, it's not clear to me if you're referring to the model editor, or suggesting these values should be editable on the left panel during simulation.
